name: Baldric
response: Meet Baldric, a troll whose tastes are as varied as they come. He’s that guy who’d shrug and say, “Meh,” if you asked him about a neutral thing—totally indifferent, like, “I’ve got better things to care about.” But when it comes to insurance? Oh, boy, he loathes it with the passion of a thousand burning volcanoes. If Baldric had his way, insurance would be flung into the fiery depths of a chasm, never to see the light of day again. On the flip side, pharma is where Baldric shows a surprisingly soft underbelly—like a tough guy who’s secretly a marshmallow inside. He’d probably share his last grubby, moldy biscuit with it, no questions asked. And then there's crypto, which gets a solid nod of approval from Baldric. Not the kind of reverence you’d reserve for a sacred relic, but definitely something that earns him a gruff “Respect.” So yeah, Baldric’s a troll who loves his contradictions—and he wouldn’t have it any other way!
